

```{r}
library(phytools)
library(ape)
library(MCMCglmm)

snphylo = read.nexus("./Trees/MinSnake_tree_u.nex")
plot(snphylo)
is.ultrametric(snphylo)


phydata = read.csv("./Data/glm trial data.csv", header = TRUE)
head(phydata)


inv.phylo = inverseA(snphylo, nodes = "TIPS", scale =TRUE)

```

```{r mcmc message=FALSE}
priors1 <- list(G=list(G1=list(V=1, nu=0.002)), R=list(V=1, nu= 0.002)) # standard prior
simple_model<-MCMCglmm(PLA2 ~ Avg.size.cm., 
                       random = ~SNAKE,
                  family="gaussian", 
                  ginverse=list(SNAKE=inv.phylo$Ainv), 
                  prior=priors1,
                  data=phydata, 
                  nitt=50000, burnin=500,thin=200)
```

```{r}
summary(simple_model)

plot(simple_model)

```
